territory_ritual_effects: All fortifications and armies in the territory suffer a share of 500 casualties over the next season. Casualties suffered by fortifications in this way are reduced by 20%.
All fortifications and armies in the territory suffer a share of 500 casualties over the next year. Casualties suffered by fortifications in this way are increased by 20%.

territory_ritual_name: Foam and Spittle of the Furious Sea
territory_ritual_effects: All navies in the territory suffer a share of 500 casualties over the next season.
All casualties suffered by campaign armies fighting in the territory are halved. Navies are only affected if they are taking a coastal order.
All casualties suffered by campaign armies fighting in the territory are doubled. Navies are only affected if they are taking a coastal order.
